```{r, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(kableExtra)

Random_Focal_Species <- read_csv("Random_Focal_Species_Extract.csv")
Random_Fisher <- read_csv("Random_Fisher_Extract.csv")
Random_Bobcat <- read_csv("Random_Bobcat_Extract.csv")
Random_Bear <- read_csv("Random_Bear_Extract.csv")
Bear <- read_csv("Bear_Extract.csv")
Bobcat <- read_csv("Bobcat_Extract.csv")
Fisher <- read_csv("Fisher_Extract.csv")
Focal_Species <- read_csv("Focal_Species_Extract.csv")
```

```{r}
#looking at the summary information for bears 

bear_summary <- Bear %>%
  group_by(verbatimScientificName) %>%
  summarize( 
    resist_mean = mean(Nat_resistance_2011),
    resist_st = sd(Nat_resistance_2011),
    resist_length = length(Nat_resistance_2011),
    core2_mean = mean(Nat_2c_default_corridors),
    core2_sd = sd(Nat_2c_default_corridors),
    core3_mean = mean(Nat_3c_default_corridors),
    core3_sd = sd(Nat_3c_default_corridors),
    bar_mean = mean(GP_Nat_bar_corridors),
    bar_sd = sd(GP_Nat_bar_corridors),
    node_mean = mean(GP_Nat_node_corridors),
    node_sd = sd(GP_Nat_node_corridors),
    node_close_mean = mean(node_close_corridors),
    node_close_sd = sd(node_close_corridors),
    bar_close_mean = mean(GP_bar_close_corridors),
    bar_close_sd = sd(GP_bar_close_corridors),
    core2_trunk_mean = mean(Nat_2c_default_corridors_truncated_at_200k),
    core2_trunk_sd = sd(Nat_2c_default_corridors_truncated_at_200k),
    core2_trunk_length = length(Nat_2c_default_corridors_truncated_at_200k),
    core3_trunk_mean = mean(Nat_3c_default_corridors_truncated_at_200k),
    core3_trunk_sd = sd(Nat_3c_default_corridors_truncated_at_200k),
    core3_trunk_length = length(Nat_3c_default_corridors_truncated_at_200k),
    bar_trunk_mean = mean(GP_Nat_bar_corridors_truncated_at_200k),
    bar_trunk_sd = sd(GP_Nat_bar_corridors_truncated_at_200k),
    bar_trunk_length = length(GP_Nat_bar_corridors_truncated_at_200k),
    node_trunk_mean = mean(GP_Nat_node_corridors_truncated_at_200k),
    node_trunk_sd = sd(GP_Nat_node_corridors_truncated_at_200k),
    node_trunk_length = length(GP_Nat_node_corridors_truncated_at_200k),
    node_close_trunk_mean = mean(node_close_corridors_truncated_at_200k),
    node_close_trunk_sd = sd(node_close_corridors_truncated_at_200k),
    node_close_trunk_length = length(node_close_corridors_truncated_at_200k),
    bar_close_trunk_mean = mean(GP_bar_close_corridors_truncated_at_200k),
    bar_close_trunk_sd = sd(GP_bar_close_corridors_truncated_at_200k),
    bar_close_trunk_length = length(GP_bar_close_corridors_truncated_at_200k)
  )

```

```{r}
#Running Statistical Tests for bears againgst the various identified corridors

bear_ttest_resistance <- t.test()
bear_ttest_2core <- t.test()
bear_ttest_3core <- t.test()
bear_ttest_bar <- t.test
bear_ttest_bar_close <- t.test()
```
